Rainy_Day_0: I love the sound of the rain on the roof.
Rainy_Day_1: I think I'll go check on the chickens.#$e#Don't worry, I won't track any mud into the house.
Rainy_Day_2: Dad sent this over, do you think you can use it?[444 724 725 726 446 430 440]
Rainy_Day_3: I think the animals will stay in today. Maybe we should too?
Rainy_Day_4: Rainy days are good days to catch up on your projects.#$e#What are you working on?
Rainy_Night_0: Did you track any mud in?#$e#Don't worry, I can sweep it up.
patio_MacFS: I love having my chickens so close to the house.
Rainy_Night_1: Ready for bed? The rain makes me sleepy.
Rainy_Night_2: I hope you were able to stay dry today.
Rainy_Night_3: Rain is good for crops, but it can be hard on animals to be stuck inside.
Rainy_Night_4: I made us a nice warm supper. I hope you like it, it's one of my favorites.[235 215 236]
Indoor_Day_0: I woke up early, so I've already been out to see my chickens.
Indoor_Day_1: Just a little something to start your day off right![235 215 236]
Indoor_Day_3: Being married is quite an adjustment.#$e#It's good, though, of course.
Indoor_Day_4: I think I'll catch up on my reading.#$e#I got a new Animal Husbandry Journal yesterday!
Indoor_Night_0: Long day?#$e#We could go to bed early...
Indoor_Night_1: Did you get everything done today that you wanted?
Indoor_Night_2: Did you close all the gates?#$e#I still have nightmares of my brothers forgetting to shut them.
Indoor_Night_3: Are all the animals in for the night?
Indoor_Night_4: Maybe I will slip out and check on the animals one last time...
Outdoor_0: Ah...I feel so at home here.
Outdoor_1: Do you think we have enough animals?
Outdoor_2: I think my chickens are settling in nicely here.
Outdoor_3: I feel like I should do more with the animals.
OneKid_0: Can you believe we are parents?#$e#We can't be old enough to be parents, right?
OneKid_1: Do you think %kid1 will want to farm when they grow up?
OneKid_3: I don't want %kid1 to be an only child...
TwoKids_0: Now that we have %kid1 and %kid2, I wonder which one will want to take over the farm?
TwoKids_1: Our children are so lucky to grow up here.
TwoKids_2: I'm glad we can give our children the sort of upbringing I had.#$e#Fresh air... farm life...
TwoKids_3: Maybe if %kid1 and %kid2 both want to farm, we can buy the old Vogel place for one of them?
Good_2: Are you enjoying married life, love?#$e#I know I am.
funLeave_MacFS: I think I'll go visit my family today.
funReturn_MacFS: I wasn't able to catch everyone, but it would be good to see my family.#$e#I should probably go visit the ranch more often.
spring_23: Will we go to the Flower Dance tomorrow?#$e#I'm not sure I'll get the steps right...
spring_12: Do you want to go to the Egg Festival tomorrow?#$e#I was asked to donate eggs...
summer_10: Will we go to the Luau tomorrow? What shall we take?
summer_1: Ah, the first day of summer.
summer_27: I'm looking forward to seeing the Moonlight Jellies.#$e#They don't make it up to Stoffton.
fall_15: Will we have a Grange Display tomorrow?#$e#I'm sure you'll win!
fall_26: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow! I can't believe Pelican Town has so many festivals.
winter_1: I hope you put enough hay up this year.#$e#I'd hate to see our animals go hungry.
winter_7: Will we go to the Festival of Ice tomorrow?
winter_24: Did you get a gift for your secret friend?#$e#I can't wait to see who mine is!
spring_MacFS: What are you growing this season?
fall_MacFS: Have we put up enough hay? Maybe I should help...
summer_MacFS: I hope the animals aren't too warm today.
winter_MacFS: I hope our animals don't get too cold.#$e#You've got heaters for them all, right?
spouseRoom_MacFS: It's fun to have a space for all the furniture I've made.
